meanings.definition: A type of bet in horse racing where the bettor must select the first three finishers in a race in the correct order.
meanings.sent1: I won a triactor by correctly picking the top three horses in the race.
meanings.sent2: She placed a triactor bet on the horse race, hoping to predict the exact order of the top three finishers.
meanings.sent3: The triactor bet made the horse race even more exciting for the spectators.
meanings.sent4: His accurate triactor prediction was like hitting the jackpot in horse racing.
meanings.sent5: The triactor challenge added an element of thrill and strategy to the horse race betting.
